name: Employment Contract
description: This service includes review, building of existing contracts of invidual employee, business & nonprofit firms by maintaining conflicts of interest, protection of work product, confidentiality and legal advice.

name: Harassment Policy
description: She can customize a harrasment policy manual or rebuild existing manual. This package covers bullying, harrasment, privacy of personal information, confidentiality and workplace safety.

name: Legal Proceedings
description: Representing employers for civil lawsuit in court and prursuing legal claims for breach of the agreement. After case assesment and based on hearing days, price of this service package can be changed.
